comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Emile Laurent, Prefect of Police in Paris, from Sept 1914 to June 1917. See NYT of Nov 28, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F00F11FA3E5F1773... for interview article with photo that seems very like this man, with moustache, same shape of collar and tie, although without topper. See also fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Liste_des_pr%C3%A9fets_de_police_de...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Another picture of Laurent at archive.org/stream/pariswardays00barnuoft#page/168/mode/2up in Paris War Days by Charles Inman Barnard

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/23103743@N05] You are right. A short biography with a very similar photo to the Bain picture is here.

comment._content: Thanks for the information!  We will update our record.
